First, the code structure:

#include <stdio.h>

#include <stdlib.h>

#include <string.h>

#include <ctype.h>

#include <math.h>

#include <stdbool.h>

#include <limits.h>

// Function to check if a character is a Latin letter (a-z)

bool isLatinLetter(char c) {

    return (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z');

}

// Function to check if a character is punctuation (.,!?)

bool isPunctuation(char c) {

    return (c == '.' || c == ',' || c == '!' || c == '?');

}

int main() {

    int n;

    char *s;

    // Read n and s from stdin.

    scanf("%d", &n);

    s = malloc(1000); // assuming input string is not too long

    scanf("%s", s);

    // Step 1: Compute firstOutput.

    // Compute difference string.

    int len_diff = n-1;

    int max_diff_len = 3 * len_diff + 1;

    char *diff_str = malloc(max_diff_len);

    diff_str[0] = '\0';

    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {

        int diff = abs(s[i] - s[i-1]);

        char temp[4];

        sprintf(temp, "%d", diff);

        strcat(diff_str, temp);

    }

    int firstOutput;

    if (n == 2) {

        firstOutput = diff_str[0] - '0';

    } else {

        bool has_one = false;

        for (int i = 0; diff_str[i]; i++) {

            if (diff_str[i] == '1') {

                has_one = true;

                break;

            }

        }

        if (has_one) {

            int count = 0;

            for (int i = 0; diff_str[i]; i++) {

                if (diff_str[i] == '1') count++;

            }

            firstOutput = count % 2;

        } else {

            int count = 0;

            for (int i = 0; diff_str[i]; i++) {

                if (diff_str[i] == '2') count++;

            }

            firstOutput = (count % 2) * 2;

        }

    }

    // Step 2: Compute secondOutput.

    long long secondOutput = 0;

    int digits[20], count = 0;

    int x = firstOutput;

    while (x > 0) {

        int r = x % 10;

        int min_digit = (r < (9 - r)) ? r : (9 - r);

        digits[count++] = min_digit;

        x /= 10;

    }

    for (int i = count-1; i >=0; i--) {

        secondOutput = secondOutput * 10 + digits[i];

    }

    // Step 3: Process third step.

    char *thirdInput = malloc(20);

    sprintf(thirdInput, "%lld", secondOutput);

    int len_third = strlen(thirdInput);

    char *result = malloc(len_third + 1);

    result[0] = thirdInput[0];

    int res_len = 1;

    for (int i = 1; i < len_third; i++) {

        char c = thirdInput[i];

        if (isLatinLetter(c)) {

            if (!isLatinLetter(thirdInput[i-1])) {

                result[res_len++] = ' ';

            }

            result[res_len++] = c;

        } else if (isPunctuation(c)) {

            result[res_len++] = c;

        }

    }

    result[res_len] = '\0';

    // Output the result.

    printf("%s\n", result);

    // Free allocated memory.

    free(diff_str);

    free(s);

    free(thirdInput);

    free(result);

    return 0;

}
